SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.model.observer

Interface IBoardSubject

All Known Implementing Classes:
Battleship, Binary, Fillapix, Heyawake, LightUp, Masyu, Minesweeper, Nurikabe, Puzzle, ShortTruthTable, Skyscrapers, StarBattle, Sudoku, Thermometer, TreeTent
public interface IBoardSubject
IBoardSubject defines methods for managing and notifying board listeners. It allows for adding and removing listeners, and for notifying them using a specified algorithm.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addBoardListener(IBoardListener listener)
    Adds a board listener.
    void
    notifyBoardListeners(Consumer<? super IBoardListener> algorithm)
    Notifies all the listeners using the specified algorithm.
    void
    removeBoardListener(IBoardListener listener)
    Removes a board listener.

  • Method Details

    • addBoardListener

      Adds a board listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - listener to add

    • removeBoardListener

      void removeBoardListener(IBoardListener listener)
      Removes a board listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - listener to remove

    • notifyBoardListeners

      void notifyBoardListeners(Consumer<? super IBoardListener> algorithm)
      Notifies all the listeners using the specified algorithm.
      Parameters:
      algorithm - algorithm used to notify the listeners
